full_summary:
# Request for Proposal – Risk Management Specialist (Senior)

## Tender Details

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-23-01024089 |
| Solicitation Number | 23-225879 |
| Publication Date | January 31, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | February 15, 2023, at 14:00 (EST) |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Amendment Date | February 13, 2023 |

## Contract Requirements

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Global Affairs Canada) is inviting Request for Proposals (RFP) from qualified bidders for the provision of Risk Management Specialist (Senior) services.

The scope of the contract includes:

* Estimated quantity of commodity: One (1)
* Risk Management Specialist (Senior) for a period of approximately 40 weeks
* Potential for optional periods of one (1) year each

## Eligibility

To be eligible for this tender, bidders must:

* Hold a valid contractor identification number (CIN)
* Be a Canadian corporation or partnership
* Be registered in the Supplier Registration Database (SRD)
* Not be in financial default to the Government of Canada

## Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the bid offering the best value based on the following criteria:

* Technical capability
* Past performance
* Pricing

## Notice Details

The complete Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) can be accessed through the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS).

[Attachment: 23-225879_NPP_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/31/f58051804f0cf07f483c051e2514cc23/)
[Attachment: 23-225879_NPP_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/31/119a766adb1ccf88c29b99ba53a3632e/)

## Contact Information

Arif Hussain
Arif.Hussain@international.gc.ca
613-204-1833

## Important Dates

* Tender closing date: February 15, 2023, at 14:00 (EST)
* Contract start date: Upon contract award
* Contract end date: March 31, 2024

Please note that this is a Request for Proposal and not an invitation to tender. All
